data_variables.name: num
data_variables.description: A number to be rounded to two decimal places in the round_to_two_places function.

data_variables.name: total_candies
data_variables.description: Total number of candies to be distributed that will be smashed if not evenly divisible by the number of friends.

data_variables.name: no_frnds
data_variables.description: Number of friends sharing the candies, with a default value of 3.

data_variables.name: smallest_abs
data_variables.description: The smallest absolute value between two variables x and y.

data_flow.creation: Passed as an argument to round_to_two_places
Passed as an argument to to_smash
data_flow.flow: Used to determine how many candies must be smashed as a result of the distribution.

data_flow.creation: Passed as a second argument to to_smash, defaults to 3
data_flow.flow: Used to calculate the distribution of candies.

data_flow.creation: Calculated using the min() function on abs(x) and abs(y)
data_flow.flow: Contains the smallest absolute value between x and y.
